description:
The race is on to find the Oceanian 0.5th gen Object before it is deployed to commit atrocities.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Ari to Kirigirisu no Sensou: Oceania Gunji Kuni Kouryakusen II
La guerre de la cigale et la fourmi. L`état militaire d`Océanie, partie 2
The War of the Ant and the Grasshopper: The Invasion of the Oceanian Military State II
蟻とキリギリスの戦争 オセアニア軍事国攻略戦 II
